name: The Wretched
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.Wretched Pack Tactics: The Wretched has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Wretched's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated. The Wretched otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage, and the Wretched attaches to the target. While attached, the Wretched can't attack, and at the start of each of the Wretched's turns, the target takes 6 (1d10 + 1) necrotic damage.
